page.title: 02Unemployment in Millerston
page.content: This survey included{72}people.Sadly a lot were unemployed{(36%)}.This is a sad situation, as some are school leavers who have never been employed. Of the unemployed, some have been out of work for a year{(8%)},but more have been out of work for more than 2 years{(12%)}.In the past 3 months a lot of older people have been made redundant{(27%)}.Some people have been unemployed for over 2 years{ {(54%)}. We asked if unemployment had affected people's way of life; most said it had{(54%)}.Less money, boredom, and a drop in their standard of living were some of the disadvantages of unemployment.The only advantage was that people had more leisure time.
